name: RollBall !!!
description:
This is a new catching ball game that you have never played it.
You will get healed by enjoying the woody style.

How to play :
Just tap the gimmick in the middle of blocks.

To let these balls not falling, you need to control the gimmick to a correct direction in a right moment.

Balls will move more higher if you keep it persistently.
They will reach the goal on top of the blocks finally.

Can you do it ?
